summary: Someone asked me to try making a Sleevless Nightingale armor.  Here\'s what I got.
descriptionHtml:
Simple mod - someone saw my Barbarian thief armor and asked if I could try a sleeveless Nightingale armor variant.  It was a bit of a bugger getting a set of arms on the mesh to work, since the armor itself is SO tight that any bare body meshes clip through the armor

Just drop the meshes and textures folders into your data folder to merge the contents and make your nightingale armor sleeveless.  This does include first person sleeveless views, of course (it actually uses my first person Linwe\'s Armor Fix  =P ).

It\'s not perfect, but I hope you like it, request\'er!  


Other mods - 
Ancient Nord Armor First Person Fix - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2808
Gil Hibben Dagger Replacements - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4950
Linwe Armor First Person Fix - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1956
Spartan Armor Resource - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2198
Barbarian Thief Armor - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2094
author: Solidus2845
